oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Paul MB Church Decaturville: sign
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: St. Paul Missionary Baptist Church Decaturville

Color photograph of church sign. Lettering reads, "In Memory of Mrs. Auline Scott; St. Paul Missionary Baptist Church, Decaturville, Tenn; Sunday School, 10:00 AM; Church Services, 11:00 AM; Wednesay Night Bible Study; Pastor Rev. Johnny R. Tuner."
St. Paul Missionary Baptist Church is a rural African American church in Decaturville, Tennessee. At the time of fieldwork, Reverend Johnny R. Tuner served as pastor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
